step1.title: Design Meeting
step1.desc: In our initial meeting, we discuss your requirements in detail and develop a customised landscaping solution.

step2.title: Project Specifications
step2.desc: Matching your requirements, we provide you with specifications of all the products you have opted for.

step3.title: Client Approval
step3.desc: If there are no revisions, we proceed to receiving an official approval from you.

step4.title: Installation & Maintenance
step4.desc: Once approved, we move forward with creating your ideal space and maintaining it effectively.
